author: Seren Morris
title: California Lockdown End Date One Step Closer As Gavin Newsom to Lift Stay-at-Home Orders in Some Areas
description: Governor Newsom is set to update Californians on the statewide lockdown in a press conference today.
content:
California Governor Gavin Newsom will reveal potential steps toward lifting the state's lockdown in a press conference at noon on April 14.
In a statement on Monday, Governor Newsom said that he would explain the "incremental release of the stay-at-home orde… [+5671 chars]
